original_text: So Gad went to David and he said to him, ‘This is what the Lord says: “You must choose one of these punishments.
korean_text: 갓이 다윗에게 나아가 그에게 말하되 여호와의 말씀이 너는 마음대로 택하라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says
You must choose one of these punishments
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 이 형벌 중 하나를 선택해야 합니다
